snippet.title: BLENDER COLLECTIBLES üéÅ Blender Today LIVE #225
snippet.description:
Changelog and Q&A https://blender.community/c/today/MNNP/

BlenderToday is a weekly live show highlighting the latest news in Blender development, the community, and Q&A. Streaming from the Blender HQ in Amsterdam since 2018, hosted by Pablo Vazquez.

Support Blender by joining the Development Fund https://fund.blender.org

#b3d #BlenderToday
* Music by ¬†@Thaehan

--

## Community
* Blender Collectibles! https://store.blender.org/product-category/toys/
* RenderMan 25 https://github.com/prman-pixar/RenderManForBlender/releases/tag/v_25.0
* Orange is the new Blue: https://twitter.com/BlenderToday/status/1649352153977241602

## Changelog
Total: 239 commits, of which 61 are fixes and 73 cleanup.

### Animation
* [Animation: add function for deduplicating FCurve keys](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/85ed2e8c) - Sybren A. St√ºvel
* [Animation: Add in Parent space alignment option to the Transform Orientation gizmo](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/5c4b0c98) - Nate Rupsis
* [Animation: make properties from motion path library overrideable](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/60ced528) - Christoph Lendenfeld

### Assets
* [Assets: Do Not Show Blank Read-Only Metadata](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/199c7da0) - Harley Acheson

### Attributes
* [Attributes: Integrate implicit sharing with the attribute API](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/e45ed693) - Hans Goudey

### Curves
* [Curves: Optimize edit mode selection draw extraction](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/70d85453) - Hans Goudey

### Cycles
* [Cycles: re-enable AMD GPU binaries on Windows](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/d5757a0a) - Brecht Van Lommel
* [Cycles: add hardware raytracing support to oneAPI device](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/3f8c9951) - Nikita Sirgienko

### GPencil
* [GPencil: Several Weight Paint additions](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/397a14de) - Sietse Brouwer

### Geometry Nodes
* [Geometry Nodes: new Index of Nearest node](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/15f9e42c) - illua1
* [Geometry Nodes: Slightly optimize mesh to curve node](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/98ccee78) - Hans Goudey
* [Geometry Nodes: support outputting field without computing full node](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/ca32fb60) - Jacques Lucke

### Mesh
* [Mesh: Cache loose vertices](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/8e967cfe) - Hans Goudey
* [Mesh: Move edges to a generic attribute](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/2a4323c2) - Hans Goudey

### macOS
* [macOS: Add open files to system recent files](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/f04a7a07) - Ankit Meel

### Text object
* [Text object: operators to move cursor to the top or bottom](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/6d2351d2) - Damien Picard

### UI
* [UI: Make it possible to add shortcuts to UI operators.](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/35a8341d) - Richard Antalik
* [UI: Change the name of Invert nodes to Invert Color](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/9344deed) - zanqdo
* [UI: OS File Operations Within File Browser](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/694f792e) - Harley Acheson

### VFONT
* [VFONT: Text Selection Operator](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/68f8253c) - Harley Acheson

### Viewport Compositor
* [Realtime Compositor: Implement ID Mask node](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/3d611799) - Omar Emara

### VSE
* [VSE: Add sound strip retiming support](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/b21695a5) - Richard Antalik

### WindowManager
* [WindowManager: Context Creation](https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/b94a0ec8) - Jeroen Bakker

Realtime Compositor
* Map UV node projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/0c01e0f4

UI

* Text Object International Case Change projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/e369bf4a
